name: Merc
description:
Play as an ex-mafioso turned mercenary as he traverses the galaxy upgrading his ship to face off against the Mob Boss himself

Keyboard controls:

A / D - Rotate

J - Accelerate

K - Fire Laser

Esc - Pause

Gamepad controls:

Left Stick - Rotate

A - Accelerate

X - Fire

Start - Pause

Uploaded in a panic with no tutorial or readme-sorry!

This game was made in 48 hours for Kenney Jam 2021

All art assets were originally made by Kenney

All development was done by Daniel Muzkiz (Biohazard335) using a custom game engine coded in C++

As this version of the game was made by one person in only 48 hours its not nearly as polished as I would have liked, so if anyone is interested in an updated version leave a comment and I might come back to this project at some point
